title: Tony Levin - Pieces of the Sun (2002) [EAC-APE]
description:
1. Apollo
2. Geronimo
3. Aquafin
4. Dog One
5. Tequila
6. Pieces of the Sun
7. Phobos
8. Ooze
9. Blue Nude Reclining
10. the Fifth Man
11. Ever Will the Sun Rise
12. Silhouette


Jerry Marotta on drums (and vocals, percussion, some sax, and a little Omnichord)
Jesse Gress on electric and acoustic guitars (and some vocals)
Larry Fast on synthesizer
Tony Levin on basses and Stick
A special guest appearance by the California Guitar Trio on acoustic guitars
